Copies of Bolshevik propaganda leaflets have arrived at Afridi country for distribution to British troops. Nadir Khan's efforts to raise an Afridi battalion in Jalalabad are apparently meeting with some success.(2) Waziristan. Mahsuds and Wana Wazirs quiet. 156 Government and 166 tribal rifles received from Toclii Wazirs up to 21st May.(3) Recruiting of new battalions in Kabul continues, about 3,000 recruits having been obtained.(4) Circulation of paper money causing unrest in Afghanistan. Party of Afghan merchants selling grain in Kabul recently refused notes in payment and were imprisoned.(5) One company from each of the nine battalions in Herat have been distributed along various posts on the Russian and Persian border. Another successful raid by Jamshedis into Afghan territory is reported.Paras. (1), (3), (4), (5) not given to Press.
